notes.body: Hello Deepak Kadam,    Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #655140131890003968-32474.     We have received an update from our logistics team that your order has been delivered. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     As per the update from our team, please be informed that the refund of Rs.1,793.52/- was initiated on 05th December 2025 against returned wrong parcel medicines. The refund will be credited to your payment source account within 5-7 business days. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Deepak Kadam,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #655140131890003968-32474.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team that your order has been delivered. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.

As per the update from our team, please be informed that the refund of Rs.1,793.52/- was initiated on 05th December 2025 against returned wrong parcel medicines. The refund will be credited to your payment source account within 5-7 business days. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Care Team,

I am writing to express my extreme disappointment and frustration regarding
my order that has been significantly delayed beyond the promised delivery
date.

*Order Details:*

   - Order ID: 652573802194456576-36159-HOG
   - Tracking ID: 9148880965543
   - Courier Partner: Delhivery
   - Expected Delivery: November 30 - December 1, 2024
   - Current Status: Still in transit (Last update: December 3)

My order was supposed to be delivered between November 30 and December 1,
but as of today (December 4), it has still not been delivered. What is even
more shocking and unacceptable is the bizarre routing of my shipment:

   - *Shipped from:* Ambala, Haryana (November 26)
   - *My delivery location:* Agra, Uttar Pradesh
   - *Actual shipment route:* The package traveled to Chandigarh/Punjab,
   then incredibly went all the way to Bangalore, Karnataka, and now I have no
   idea where it currently is

This is absolutely ridiculous! My order was supposed to be delivered in
Agra, UP - a straightforward route from Ambala, Haryana (approximately
400-500 km). Instead, it has been sent across the country in completely
wrong directions - first to Punjab, then inexplicably all the way to
Bangalore in South India (over 2,000 km in the opposite direction). This
makes no logistical sense whatsoever and suggests a serious failure in
Delhivery's routing system.

This is completely unacceptable, especially considering that medicines and
healthcare products are often time-sensitive and urgently needed. The
misrouting of my shipment and complete lack of clarity on its current
whereabouts is causing significant inconvenience and distress.

*To make matters worse*, I have been trying to reach your customer service
through both chat and phone calls, but I am unable to connect with an
actual human representative. Your AI chatbot keeps responding with generic
"I can help you with this and that" messages but provides no real solution
or human assistance. This is extremely frustrating when I have such a
serious issue that clearly requires human intervention and immediate action.

*I am a PharmEasy Plus member*, and I expected priority service and better
delivery standards as part of my paid membership. Instead, I am facing the
worst possible service - a completely misrouted shipment, no clarity on
delivery, and no access to human customer support. This is a complete
failure of the premium service I paid for.

*I request the following immediate actions:*

   1. An explanation for this severe delay
   2. The current exact location of my shipment
   3. A confirmed delivery date and time
   4. Compensation for the inconvenience caused due to this delay

I have been a customer of PharmEasy and expected better service standards.
This experience has been extremely disappointing, and I hope this matter
will be resolved urgently.

I look forward to your prompt response and immediate action on this matter.

*Contact Details:*
Deepak Sharma
Phone: +91 8273738488
Email: dsharma2828@gmail.com

Regards,
Deepak Sharma

-- 


Disclaimer:

This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, 
and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is 
intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If 
you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any 
disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of 
this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to 
permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are 
requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return 
e-mail. The Company and its affiliates rule out any and every liability 
resulting from this or any other electronic transmission.

Am writing to you regarding above order ID. Some character usually calls and recommends medicine from a different manufacturer. Have a great day, Regards, Satish

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hi,

Am writing to you regarding above order ID. Some character usually calls and recommends medicine from a different manufacturer. I do not understand why your staff should try to push medicines from other manufacturers when I have categorically asked for medicine by name and it shows as available on the website. helpdesk_ticket.description:
To,
Customer Support Team
Pharmeasy

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing this letter to strongly express my dissatisfaction regarding
the handling of my return request for the wrong medicine delivered to me.

I had ordered three medicines on 30th, out of which one medicine received
was wrong. I raised a complaint immediately, and the return request was
initiated under Complaint Number 22240354.

However, even after 5 days, no proper action has been taken from your side.
According to your team, the medicine is being considered “changed,” which
is completely incorrect and unacceptable.

On 1st, when your pickup person visited to collect the return, he refused
to take the medicine stating that “the barcode is missing.” This reason is
completely invalid because the product was delivered to me in the same
condition. If the barcode was missing, it is solely your packing or
delivery team’s mistake, not mine.

I have been calling repeatedly, but still no resolution, no refund, and no
proper response has been provided.

This kind of service is highly unprofessional. I request you to immediately
process my return and refund without further delay. If this issue is not
resolved at the earliest, I will be forced to escalate this matter to
higher authorities and consumer court.

I expect a prompt and serious response regarding this matter.

Sincerely,
Dr. Mujib Khan
7892556617

--

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
To,
Customer Support Team
Pharmeasy

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing this letter to strongly express my dissatisfaction regarding the handling of my return request for the wrong medicine delivered to me.

I had ordered three medicines on 30th, out of which one medicine received was wrong. I raised a complaint immediately, and the return request was initiated under Complaint Number 22240354.

However, even after 5 days, no proper action has been taken from your side. According to your team, the medicine is being considered “changed,” which is completely incorrect and unacceptable.

On 1st, when your pickup person visited to collect the return, he refused to take the medicine stating that “the barcode is missing.” This reason is completely invalid because the product was delivered to me in the same condition. If the barcode was missing, it is solely your packing or delivery team’s mistake, not mine.

I have been calling repeatedly, but still no resolution, no refund, and no proper response has been provided.

This kind of service is highly unprofessional. I request you to immediately process my return and refund without further delay. If this issue is not resolved at the earliest, I will be forced to escalate this matter to higher authorities and consumer court.

I expect a prompt and serious response regarding this matter.

Sincerely,
Dr. Mujib Khan
7892556617

notes.body: Hello Nitin Kumar Sahu,    Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #655432111119400960-70029.     We have received an update from our logistics team that your order has been delivered. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.   As the medicine has been returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24-48 hrs business days post verification. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your source account within 5-7 business days.      Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Nitin Kumar Sahu,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #655432111119400960-70029.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team that your order has been delivered. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.

As the medicine has been returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24-48 hrs business days post verification. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your source account within 5-7 business days. 
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

Hello Sanchit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #655360071986552832-81451, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 05th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

Hello Jagan Nath,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order 655425226166476800-58331, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 06th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,

Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account. notes.body: Hello Deepak,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regard to your order #655140131890003968-32474. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per the update received from our team, please be informed that strong feedback has been shared with the respective departments for dispatching the wrong product in your order, and also we are working to solve the issue on a priority basis. PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.     Also, we raised a return request for the wrong product on 04th December 2025.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24-48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source in 5-7 business days.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Deepak,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is with regard to your order #655140131890003968-32474. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per the update received from our team, please be informed that strong feedback has been shared with the respective departments for dispatching the wrong product in your order, and also we are working to solve the issue on a priority basis. PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

Also, we raised a return request for the wrong product on 04th December 2025.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24-48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source in 5-7 business days.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Namaskaram.'

*A. Wrong Item supplied :*

Order ID 654793881173315584

I had ordered:
Onetouch Ultrasoft Lancets | Pack Of 50 Lancets (*Rs. 350*/-)

However, what is actually supplied is Onetouch Ultrasoft *2* Lancets | 2
Packs Of 25 Lancets (Rs. 164/- each) So  *a total of Rs. 328/-*
For your easy understanding, the difference between these two products is
written in *red bold underlined and with a larger font.*

There are two issues here.
1. *Wrong item is supplied This should be replaced with the correct item as
per my order forthwith without any delay.*
2. The cost of the wrongly supplied item is Rs. 328/- which is obviously
less than What I have paid for..

*This is a totally careless and unacceptable attitude of your pharmacy
partner. How is it tolerated and accepted by you?*

*B. Your customer support network and contact number :*

I opened the packet yesterday after it was delivered to me and found that
you have supplied me with the wrong item. I tried to raise a return /
replacement request through your App and also by logging on to your
website. I followed all the instructions. It  says,  "We are sorry you had
to experience this. Click on the Account icon on the App homepage, click on
the "Orders" section, tap on the respective order, click on "View details"
from the shipment & click 'Return'. We will try to resolve this on
priority."

I clicked on all the lines that were displayed on the "shipment details"
screen but never got the Return tab. I clicked on "Still  Need Help" which
gave the number: to call 07666100300 .  I called this number twice
yesterday at about 10:20 pm. Both the times, the calls got automatically
disconnected. Today, there was a taped message that the number is updated
to 8071324888 .

When I tried  this new number, I found out that this number  can be used
ONLY to order either medicines or a lab test.. No other option is
available.

In this whole rigmarole, there is no simple way for a customer to approach
you and convey his needs, lodge a complaint or ask for replacements of
wrong supplies.

I DO NOT UNDERSTAND:
WHY YOUR WEBSITE CONTINUES TO GIVE THE OLD NUMBER?
WHAT PREVENTS YOU FROM GIVING THE CORRECT NUMBER ON YOUR WEBSITE?
WHAT PREVENTS FROM UPDATING YOUR WEBSITE?
WHAT PREVENTS YOU FROM MAKING THE LIFE OF YOUR CUSTOMER COMFORTABLE BY
EASING HIS ACCESS TO YOU EITHER THROUGH YOOUR APP OR THROUGH YOUR WEBSITE?


*Although I feel that this whole issue may not get any response from you
and I may not get answers to my queries and that your customers will still
have difficulty to approach you.*
*Now, I only hope that I get what I have actually ordered in place of what
your pharmacy partner has decided to send me. *

*PS. *In contrast to this, I had a beautiful experience with one of your
competitors. I had ordered a wrong item and realized it when I received the
consignment. I informed using their App that I had ordered a wrong item,
wanted to return the same and exchange it t another item that I actually
needed. Within a few minutes, I received a call from them to inform me that
I do not have to return the WRONGLY ORDERED item but full refund for the
same was immediately being processed by them. I was further informed to
place an order for the correct item I needed. COMPARE THIS WITH MY PRESENTI
EXPERIENCE WITH YOU. IN YOUR CASE, I AM STRUGGLING TO LET YOU KNOW THAT I
RECEIVED A WRONG IITEM AND I NEED THE SAME TO BE REPLACED BY WHAT I ORDERED
WITH YOU.

Pranam.

Vasant K. Kulkarni

Tel : +91 98204 98803




*“If you are willing to strive, you can transcend all your limitations.” ~
Sadhguru*

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Wrong item supplied Order ID 654793881173315584 and your Customer support Telephone Numbers
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Namaskaram.'

A. Wrong Item supplied :

Order ID 654793881173315584

I had ordered: 

Onetouch Ultrasoft Lancets | Pack Of 50 Lancets (Rs. 350/-)


However, what is actually supplied is 

Onetouch Ultrasoft 2 Lancets | 2 Packs Of 25 Lancets (Rs. 164/- each) So  a total of Rs. 328/-

For your easy understanding, the difference between these two products is written in red bold underlined and with a larger font.

There are two issues here. 
1. Wrong item is supplied This should be replaced with the correct item as per my order forthwith without any delay.
2. The cost of the wrongly supplied item is Rs. 328/- which is obviously less than What I have paid for..

This is a totally careless and unacceptable attitude of your pharmacy  partner. How is it tolerated and accepted by you?

B. Your customer support network and contact number :

I opened the packet yesterday after it was delivered to me and found that you have supplied me with the wrong item. I tried to raise a return /  replacement request through your App and also by logging on to your website. I followed all the instructions. It  says,  "We are sorry you had to experience this. Click on the Account icon on the App homepage, click on the "Orders" section, tap on the respective order, click on "View details" from the shipment & click 'Return'. We will try to resolve this on priority." 
 
I clicked on all the lines that were displayed on the "shipment details" screen but never got the Return tab. I clicked on "Still  Need Help" which gave the number: to call 07666100300 .  I called this number twice yesterday at about 10:20 pm. Both the times, the calls got automatically disconnected. Today, there was a taped message that the number is updated to 8071324888 . 

When I tried  this new number, I found out that this number  can be used ONLY to order either medicines or a lab test.. No other option is available. 

In this whole rigmarole, there is no simple way for a customer to approach  you and convey his needs, lodge a complaint or ask for replacements of wrong supplies.

I DO NOT UNDERSTAND:
WHY YOUR WEBSITE CONTINUES TO GIVE THE OLD NUMBER?
WHAT PREVENTS YOU FROM GIVING THE CORRECT NUMBER ON YOUR WEBSITE? 
WHAT PREVENTS FROM UPDATING YOUR WEBSITE? 
WHAT PREVENTS YOU FROM MAKING THE LIFE OF YOUR CUSTOMER COMFORTABLE BY EASING HIS ACCESS TO YOU EITHER THROUGH YOOUR APP OR THROUGH YOUR WEBSITE?


Although I feel that this whole issue may not get any response from you and I may not get answers to my queries and that your customers will still have difficulty to approach you.
Now, I only hope that I get what I have actually ordered in place of what your pharmacy partner has decided to send me. 

PS. In contrast to this, I had a beautiful experience with one of your competitors. I had ordered a wrong item and realized it when I received the consignment. I informed using their App that I had ordered a wrong item, wanted to return the same and exchange it t another item that I actually needed. Within a few minutes, I received a call from them to inform me that I do not have to return the WRONGLY ORDERED item but full refund for the same was immediately being processed by them. I was further informed to place an order for the correct item I needed. COMPARE THIS WITH MY PRESENTI EXPERIENCE WITH YOU. IN YOUR CASE, I AM STRUGGLING TO LET YOU KNOW THAT I RECEIVED A WRONG IITEM AND I NEED THE SAME TO BE REPLACED BY WHAT I ORDERED WITH YOU.

Pranam.
 
Vasant K. Kulkarni

Tel : +91 98204 98803

“If you are willing to strive, you can transcend all your limitations.” ~ Sadhguru

notes.body: Hello Ketaki,      Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your query is related to the MRP price issue. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     I would like to inform you that the products listed in the app are not linked to the price. Thus, we share the estimated cost at the time of order placement, which can be either higher or lower than the actual price. We send you an SMS/push notification for the total discounted amount that needs to be paid as soon as your medicines are procured.     Sometimes, the MRP of the medicines may vary depending on the stock received by the chemist. This price variation will always be due to price changes by the medicine manufacturer. However, if the pricing on the medicine packaging differs from what is printed on the bill, please get back to us with the image of the medicine highlighting the batch number so that we can get the issue resolved.     Moreover, kindly share the screenshot of the product page and cart page to assist you.     If your concern is related to any order, kindly share the order ID. I will be more than happy to check your order and assist you further.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Ketaki,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I understand your query is related to the MRP price issue. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

I would like to inform you that the products listed in the app are not linked to the price. Thus, we share the estimated cost at the time of order placement, which can be either higher or lower than the actual price. We send you an SMS/push notification for the total discounted amount that needs to be paid as soon as your medicines are procured.

Sometimes, the MRP of the medicines may vary depending on the stock received by the chemist. This price variation will always be due to price changes by the medicine manufacturer. However, if the pricing on the medicine packaging differs from what is printed on the bill, please get back to us with the image of the medicine highlighting the batch number so that we can get the issue resolved.

Moreover, kindly share the screenshot of the product page and cart page to assist you.

If your concern is related to any order, kindly share the order ID. I will be more than happy to check your order and assist you further.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

MOREPEN PREGNANCY KIT PREGNANCY TEST KIT - PACK OF 10 quantity of 1. I am sorry to know that you have received medicines in a damaged condition.     As per the records, the item was picked up on 13th December 2025. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. Also, once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your PharmEasy wallet in 24 hours.     ​I appreciate your patience in the meantime.    For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888. notes.body: Hello Yash,      Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   With regards to your order #655181252839317504, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine   TELMA CT 40/6.25MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS of 2 quantity. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.     Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Yash,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
With regards to your order #655181252839317504, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine 
TELMA CT 40/6.25MG STRIP OF 15 TABLETS of 2 quantity. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

I have highlighted the issue to our partner retailer. The issue is being investigated; this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will try to initiate a refund for the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our partner retailer.

Once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source within 5-7 working days. Also, please confirm whether the order was delivered in intact condition.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Ajay,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     For the Free Doctor Consultation offer after completing your order. We are happy to guide you on how to avail this benefit:  Visit the “My Orders” section in your account.  Locate the relevant order and click on the Free Doctor Consultation option.  A coupen code will be displayed on the screen.  Use Coupen code to proceed further and select your preferred doctor, along with the date and time for the consultation.  Once you have selected the date and time, click on “Place Order”. Your consultation will then be scheduled without any payment.  Please note: This option will only be visible for orders where the Free Doctor Consultation offer was available at the time of placing the order.  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  Shruti Vaviya
notes.body_html:
Hello Ajay,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

For the Free Doctor Consultation offer after completing your order. We are happy to guide you on how to avail this benefit:

Visit the “My Orders” section in your account.

Locate the relevant order and click on the Free Doctor Consultation option.

A coupen code will be displayed on the screen.

Use Coupen code to proceed further and select your preferred doctor, along with the date and time for the consultation.

Once you have selected the date and time, click on “Place Order”. Your consultation will then be scheduled without any payment.

Please note: This option will only be visible for orders where the Free Doctor Consultation offer was available at the time of placing the order.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
Shruti Vaviya

notes.body: Hello,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the order ID 655617995169427456-39596. I will surely assist you with this.     Please be informed that the order is confirmed and cannot be modified at this stage. Hence, we are unable to upload the prescription in the existing order. If you wish, you can place a new order with the prescription.     You also have an option to place an order via prescription. You may follow the steps below to place an order by prescription.   Click on Order Medicine - Order via Prescription.  Upload a prescription and proceed to checkout.  Select a delivery address or add a new address.  Select the payment method and place an order.      As per the records, the order was assigned for a doctor consultation. Our partnered doctors tried multiple times to reach out to you for the consultation however, they were unable to connect with you.     I request you to place a new order with an active number, or you may upload a valid prescription to avoid doctor consultation. I am sorry to inform you that the order could not be processed further without the teleconsultation.     You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.  https://pharmeasy.in/help/doctor-consultation-43000550954/why-was-a-doctor-consultation-arranged-for-my-order--43000487599  ​  Kindly confirm if the registered number is active or not so we can arrange a doctor call on the registered number.  ​   Awaiting your response. I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

notes.body: Hello Bharat,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand you wish to return the medicine from your order #626979391360864256-68531.  ​   Thank you for sharing the image. I have highlighted the issue to the Escalations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store post-verification. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24 hours. Once the amount gets credited to your PharmEasy wallet (refund cash) you can use the full amount in your next order and also there is no expiry for this amount.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Tahera
